name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Jack D. GROSSMAN, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Jack D. GROSSMAN, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW this 21st day of April, 1987, the petition for allowance of appeal is granted limited to the question whether the breadth of the search warrant in this case requires the suppression of some or all of the evidence seized by the police in their execution of the warrant.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
524 A.2d 896
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Jack D. GROSSMAN, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 21, 1987.
